patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -11,9 +11,9 @@
             className={`${styles.inputField} ${styles.withLabel}`}
             value={value}
             onChange={onChange}
           >
-            <option value="">{placeholder}</option>
+            <option value="oi">{placeholder}</option>
             {options.map((option) => (
               <option key={option.value} value={option.value}>
                 {option.label || option.value}
               </option>
